items.name: addressing-law-no-2014-78.md
items.title: Addressing (By-law No. 2014â€“78) | City of Ottawa
items.summary: This by-law regulates the naming of private roads and highways and the numbering of buildings and lots, detailing application processes, administrative responsibilities, public notification, requirements for civic number and street name signs, agreements for private roads, enforcement, penalties, and associated fees.
